resources.string: Choose a category of data to view
In order for the app to use your location, you need to grant this permission. You can choose not to, but if so you will need to manually position the map.
Rate us on the Play Store

This app displays data from The LIST (Land Information System Tasmania), see here. Specifically, the app displays data from the public ArcGIS REST Service which can be found here. Data provided via The LIST is subject to terms and conditions set out here. Note this link leads to a PDF file of the terms and conditions.


The app also displays data from the Mineral Resources Tasmania Web Feature Service found here.
LISTData Viewer is not created, supported or endorsed by The LIST, the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment, Mineral Resources Tasmania, The Department of State Growth or any other part of the State Government - in fact they are probably largely unaware of it.


It has been developed by ex nihilum as a freely available mobile viewer for publicly accessible data from The LIST and other open Tasmanian spatial data sources. Note that The LIST data is generally subject to Creative Commons 3 (or attribution) licencing. 


Queries regarding LISTData Viewer can be directed to the creator via the link below.
